com.adobe.aem.commons.assetshare.content

Interface MetadataProperties


  • @ProviderType
public interface MetadataProperties

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,List<String>> getMetadataProperties(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request)
      Collect the Metadata fields across Assets Metadata Schemas.
      Map<String,List<String>> getMetadataProperties(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request, List<String> metadataFieldResourceTypes)
      Collect the Metadata fields across Assets Metadata Schemas.

    • Method Detail

      • getMetadataProperties

        Map<String,List<String>> getMetadataProperties(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request,
                                               List<String> metadataFieldResourceTypes)
        Collect the Metadata fields across Assets Metadata Schemas. To be collected the following must be true: - The metadata field must be of resource type: metadataFieldResourceTypes - Only the top-most matching field is collected (ie. in multi-value fields, the top level field is used). - The field bust have a non-blank Label AND PropertyName defined.
        Parameters:
        request - the request object.
        metadataFieldResourceTypes - the sling:resourceTypes that identify candidate metadata schema widget resources.
        Returns:
        a map, indexed by propertyName of propertyName: labels[] defined in all metadata schemas that meet the metadataFieldResourceTypes acceptance check.

      • getMetadataProperties

        Map<String,List<String>> getMetadataProperties(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Collect the Metadata fields across Assets Metadata Schemas. To be collected the following must be true: - The metadata field must be of resource type: GraniteUI Field resource type. - Only the top-most matching field is collected (ie. in multi-value fields, the top level field is used). - The field bust have a non-blank Label AND PropertyName defined.
        Parameters:
        request - the request object.
        Returns:
        a map, indexed by propertyName of propertyName: labels[] defined in all metadata schemas that meet the metadataFieldResourceTypes acceptance check.
